name: v0.7.2
body:
## Features
- Reworked the deployment file [validator](https://docs.api3.org/airnode/v0.7/reference/packages/validator.html) and added many new rules
- Added support for OIS-defined [pre-processing or API requests or post-processing of API responses](https://docs.api3.org/ois/v1.0.0/processing.html)
- Added a [gas price multiplier](https://docs.api3.org/airnode/v0.7/reference/deployment-files/config-json.html#options-gaspricemultiplier) to be able to set an aggresive/conservative strategy
- Increased the fulfillment size limit from 1KB to 16KB
- [Airnode examples](https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/tree/master/packages/airnode-examples) now default to using pre-built Docker images

## What's Changed
* Fix heartbeat API key location & name (v0.4) by @amarthadan in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/840
* Fix broken validator docs link by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1023
* Fix README headers by @bbenligiray in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1024
* Loose Solidity version requirement for IOwnableCallForwarder by @bbenligiray in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1026
* Bump solidity-coverage from 0.7.20 to 0.7.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1028
* Bump @types/mocha from 9.1.0 to 9.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1034
* Bump @types/aws-lambda from 8.10.93 to 8.10.95 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1033
* Bump eslint-plugin-jest from 26.1.4 to 26.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1031
* Bump @types/node from 17.0.25 to 17.0.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1036
* Bump aws-sdk from 2.1058.0 to 2.1120.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1030
* AN-470 | Default to released docker images for airnode-examples flow by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1021
* Remove dependabot changelog URLs causing failed CI by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1038
* Bump @google-cloud/storage from 5.17.0 to 5.19.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1029
* Bump google-auth-library from 7.14.1 to 8.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1032
* Rework ApiCallSuccessResponse type by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/871
* Fix GCP signed data gateway receipt, let deployer fail with non zero status code by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1022
* Remove airnode address from template verification by @vponline in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1037
* Fix condition for enabling GCP API gateway service by @amarthadan in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1044
* Update outdated README for the signed data gateway example by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1039
* Clarify airnode-examples README for users and devs by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1040
* Save log index by @vponline in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1027
* Remove v1 validator by @vponline in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1047
* Add config.json based pre and post-processing by @aquarat in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1008
* Bump @types/node from 17.0.27 to 17.0.31 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1062
* Bump google-auth-library from 8.0.1 to 8.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1058
* Bump express from 4.17.3 to 4.18.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1057
* Bump axios from 0.26.1 to 0.27.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1059
* Bump @google-cloud/functions-framework from 3.0.0 to 3.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1064
* Bump typescript from 4.6.3 to 4.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1061
* Bump aws-sdk from 2.1058.0 to 2.1125.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1065
* Bump syncpack from 6.2.1 to 7.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1066
* Bump @google-cloud/storage from 5.17.0 to 5.19.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1063
* Replace links to OIS docs with latest by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1054
* Remove skipValidation parameter by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1048
* Create validator CLI by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1049
* Bump cross-fetch from 2.2.5 to 2.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1069

* Document how to build validator from source by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1050
* Add gasPriceMultiplier for legacy gas prices by @vponline in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1043
* Enhance processing and add caching by @aquarat in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1025

* Enforce node version and create script for bumping them by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1052

* Bump aws-sdk from 2.1058.0 to 2.1130.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1080

* Validate chain options by type of transaction by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1103

* Enable zod strict mode by @amarthadan in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1144

* Fix GCP gateway template filenames by @amarthadan in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1146

* Enhance validator schema, use default endpoint parameters by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1159

* Make "unit" required for priorityFee by @dcroote in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1231
* Fix endpoint IDs in examples by @kolenic-martin in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1179
* Update max fulfillment size by @Siegrift in https://github.com/api3dao/airnode/pull/1238
